====Linux for PlayStation 3====
====Linux for PlayStation 3====
{{main|Linux for PlayStation 3}}
{{main|Linux for PlayStation 3}}
â
The PlayStation 3 also supports running the Linux OS, though this time without the need for any additional hardware purchase. [[Yellow Dog Linux]] provides an official distribution that can be downloaded, and other distributions such as [[Fedora (operating system)|Fedora]], [[Gentoo Linux|Gentoo]] and [[Ubuntu]] have been successfully installed and operated on the console.
+
The PlayStation 3 also supports running the Linux OS, though this time without the need for any additional hardware purchase. [[Yellow Dog Linux]] provides an official distribution that can be downloaded, and other distributions such as [[Fedora (operating system)|Fedora]], [[Gentoo Linux|Gentoo]] and [[Ubuntu (operating system)|Ubuntu]] have been successfully installed and operated on the console.
